titles.title: North American Grasslands Conservation Act of 2022
A bill to establish a North American Grasslands Conservation Council, and for other purposes.
North American Grasslands Conservation Act of 2022

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
North American Grasslands Conservation Act of 2022
This bill sets forth requirements to establish councils, a conservation strategy, and programs to conserve and restore grasslands in North America, such as a grant program to support voluntary grasslands conservation projects.
